segments.text: Not yet , but I'm thinking of it . Have you bought one , Dad ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I took out a life insurance policy and made your mother the beneficiary .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you tell me why you want to buy it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am a fireman and it is a dangerous job . I have to consider your mother's life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I see . Do you advise me to buy one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have children now . What if something , God forbid , happens to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . Well , how much do you think I should get ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A $ 100 000 policy shouldn't be too expensive . Here , call my agent . He'll give you a good deal .
segments.speaker: S1
